item.title: Encryption is a human rights issue: Your privacy and free speech depend on it
item.description: Authors: Amul Kalia Published: December 2016 URL: https://www.learnliberty.org/blog/encryption-is-a-human-rights-issue-your-privacy-and-free-speech-depend-on-it/ Abstract: Encryption was at the heart of the ideas that led to the America’s founding. Learn More…
